alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 10:40AM EDT until April 24 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Michigamme River near Witch Lake affecting Dickinson and Marquette Counties. Sturgeon River near Chassell affecting Houghton and Baraga Counties. Michigamme River near Republic affecting Marquette County. .Runoff from rain will continue to cause high flows in rivers which will reach critical levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Michigamme River near Witch Lake. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood waters cover significant portions of County Road LG between M-95 and Michigamme Dam. Houses near Bengtson Bridge in South Republic are further impacted by flood waters * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:10 AM CDT Friday /10:10 AM EDT Friday/ the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:10 AM CDT Friday /10:10 AM EDT Friday/ was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 7.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.9 feet on 05/07/1975. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Saturday afternoon at 100 PM CDT /200 PM EDT/.
